name: Salsa Picante Chocolate Habanero
shortDescription: Smoky chocolate habaneros balanced with pineapple and cacao nibs for a layered heat.
description: Our flagship sauce infuses locally grown chocolate habaneros with roasted cacao nibs, pineapple, and panela. Expect a deep, molasses-like heat that mellows into tropical brightness. It’s brilliant on roasted vegetables, rice bowls, or drizzled over ceviche.

name: Sunrise Citrus Granola
shortDescription: Crunchy oats, sprouted cashews, and candied orange peel with a hint of cardamom.
description: Inspired by café mornings in San José, this gluten-free granola combines sprouted cashews, puffed quinoa, candied orange peel, and local honey. Turmeric and ginger add anti-inflammatory warmth while cardamom keeps the finish bright.

name: Mango Guava Fire
shortDescription: Bright mango and guava sweetness layered with charred Scotch bonnet heat.
description: Tropical fruit meets roasted chiles in this sauce that starts sweet and finishes with a satisfying burn. Mango and pink guava puree cool the initial bite, while charred Scotch bonnets, allspice, and panela create depth. Try it on grilled shrimp, tacos al pastor, or plantain empanadas.

name: Selva Noche Cashew Butter
shortDescription: Stone-ground cashew butter with cacao, cardamom, and adaptogenic lion’s mane.
description: A velvety cashew butter infused with raw cacao, roasted plantain, and lion’s mane mushroom for cognitive support. Touches of vanilla bean and cane syrup make it decadent yet balanced. Spread over toasted sourdough, swirl into oatmeal, or pair with crisp apples.

name: Hibiscus Ginger Spritzer Kit
shortDescription: Tart hibiscus, fresh ginger, and pink peppercorn sachets for sparkling refrescos.
description: Each sachet steeps into a vibrant ruby concentrate powered by hibiscus petals, ginger, and pink peppercorn. Blend with sparkling water, coconut water, or mocktails for antioxidant-rich fizz. Inspired by ferias in San Ramón, it’s naturally caffeine-free and perfect for summer gatherings.

name: Verde Vibrante Sipping Broth
shortDescription: Herbal sipping broth packed with chayote greens, moringa, and lime leaf.
description: A restorative sipping broth featuring chayote leaves, moringa, and lemongrass sourced from regenerative farms in Guanacaste. Finished with lime leaf and a touch of sea lettuce for gentle salinity, this broth is ideal for afternoon resets or post-yoga hydration.
